original_text:
so that
“‘they may indeed see but not perceive,
    and may indeed hear but not understand,
lest they should turn and be forgiven.’”
korean_text: 이는 그들로 보기는 보아도 알지 못하며 듣기는 들어도 깨닫지 못하게 하여 돌이켜 죄 사함을 얻지 못하게 하려 함이라 하시고

sentences.original_text: they may indeed see but not perceive
and may indeed hear but not understand
lest they should turn and be forgiven
